resources.string: To prevent misreporting of repeated calls or dialed-back numbers, reporting number requires call log permission.

Some apps run extra foreground services, add the service names here to exclude them.

To find a service name:
  1. Activate the service in that app.
  2. All activated service names will appear here.
  3. Tap a name to add it.

You can add multiple names, separated by commas.

Only the following spam categories are supported, any other category from the API should be mapped to one of them.

- {valid}
  Report as valid number, not a spam.

- {fraud}
- {marketing}
- {survey}
- {political}

- {other}
  The fallback spam type, used when none of the above categories apply.
Category %s is not configured in action %s, please configure it in the API configuration(if the API supports this category).
